text: The Little Gangster () is a 1990 French drama film directed by Jacques Doillon. It was entered into the 41st Berlin International Film Festival where it won an Honourable Mention. ==Cast== * Richard Anconina as Le flic, Gérard * Gérald Thomassin as Le garçon, Marc * Clotilde Courau as La soeur, Nathalie (Stéphanie) * Jocelyne Perhirin as La mère * Cécile Reigher as La vendeuse * Daniel Villanova as Le principal * Dominique Huchede as Le professeur * Dominique Soler as La mère de Jérémy * Ananda Regi as Jérémy ==References== ==External links== * Category:1990 films Category:1990 drama films Category:French films Category:French drama films Category:French-language films Category:Films directed by Jacques Doillon Category:Films scored by Philippe Sarde Category:Louis Delluc Prize winners
title: The Little Gangster
